description:
This time... Onii-chan throws away some figure parts, Ebina-chan invites Umaru and Onii-chan out to ramen, Umaru eats Japanese candy with Sylphyn, Onii-chan meets a cat and gets confused, unexpectedly invites Bomber to the house, and the shocking truth is revealed... Maybe it was, or maybe it wasn`t...
Source: crunchyroll
